title: Large-Scale Remote Language Learning Design Using the CAFE Model: Integrated Reading-Writing Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital learning tools and foundational understanding of language learning (reading, writing, listening)
context.additional_context: Customized microlearning design for job seekers to improve language skills (grammar, vocabulary, writing, reading comprehension), targeting application in real business communication scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can explain inquiry procedures for designing remote language education using the four CAFE model elements (Content, Activity, Facilitation, Evaluation).
Learners can design a 15-minute language learning micro-content in mobile environments, integrating text-based vocabulary and grammar elements.
Learners can implement formative assessment activities using real-time feedback tools (quizzes, discussion boards) and provide feedback considering learners' expressive and reading abilities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
